price: 6. Waxay beeniyeen (Xaqa), sidaas darteed waxaa u imaan wararka waxay ku jees-jeesayeen.
arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqad kadhabū fasayatīhim anbāu mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
